text: Mi-Pay is a contactless NFC-based mobile payment system that supports credit, debit and public transportation cards in China. The service was launched by Xiaomi in partnership with UnionPay.http://www.gizmodo.in/indiamodo/Xiaomi- launches-contactless-payment-service-Mi-Pay/articleshow/53960716.cms In December 2018 Xiaomi launched Mi Pay in India with partnership with ICICI Bank. Apart from sending and receiving money, one can pay utility bills and mobile and broadband recharges. ==See also== *Apple Pay *Samsung Pay == References == Category:Payment service providers Category:Online payments
title: Mi-Pay
